titles.title: Recognizing December 17, 2023, as the 30th anniversary of when the first B-2 stealth bomber touched down at Whiteman Air Force Base in Missouri.
Recognizing December 17, 2023, as the 30th anniversary of when the first B-2 stealth bomber touched down at Whiteman Air Force Base in Missouri.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary: This resolution recognizes the 30th anniversary of the first B-2 stealth bomber touching down at Whiteman Air Force Base in Missouri.
